"This is a 'Valdo' fruit, my lady. Why, with this fine specimen, you can cure anyone of a naturally-made poison."
One woman picked up a Valdo fruit from the selection laid out and examined it. "A naturally-made poison you say? What poisons can it cure?"
The man smiled and winked. "Such as the toxins from Destroying Angel mushrooms, Monkshood, Poison-Dart frog skin toxins and even the poison of the rare 'Gilenda Apple Berry'."
The other woman looked at the dealer in confusion. "Gilenda what? Never heard of it."
The dealer chuckled. "A 'Gilenda Apple Berry'. It is infact a berry that looks exactly like an apple, but the stem has a bright green tinge. The poison from it will make the poor traveller as sick as a dog and kill him the next day. It is not often seen around the Hyrule province, so many times people fall for the berry." He took the lady's hand and kissed it. "May I interest you young ladies in any of my merchandise? For you, I will make a generous offer."
Midna flew off in disgust. She wasn't here to watch men woo foolish young girls. The princess looked around for a few minutes more and then she thought she heard the word 'slave'...
15211.title: Have a look around

152111.content:
Midna turned around and headed towards the stage with people in shackles and chains lined up on it. "Should be interesting. I've haven't seen these kinds of auctions since the last time I was in my own kingdom." For once, these light dwellers didn't seem so boring. She watched with a small smile and examined all the slaves in the line up. One particular young woman stood out of the slaves and Midna could see she was different from the rest.
She wore a torn blue silk dress with a few beautiful designs on it. Her hair was a gorgeous brown, but looked like it wasn't brushed for days. Also, her eyes were a striking baby blue. Though, that wasn't entirely what reminded Midna of another light dweller she knew, it was the burning determination in the gaze. A look... of a Princess who had seen many battles. Maybe one too many.
An older man with armor on and a scruffy ginger beard and a bald head stepped up and started shouting information about what each slave could do. He made his way down the line until he got to the woman. "This girl here," he grabbed her arm and tugged her forward roughly, "is a Princess from a far away land. She was a tricky one to capture, but I tell ya, one Hell of a prize." The slave peddler smirked at her with his yellow teeth. "She can--" He was cut off by the girl.
"I am Princess Lie Otta and I shall be no one's slave." She glared at the peddler with a deadly intent. Midna became more intrigued by the Princess's strong will. The girl ripped her arm away from the man's grip and stepped forward. "If anyone is willing to escort me back to Trifillya, I would--" Cut off by the slave peddler.
"ENOUGH! You do this everywhere we go! Shoo, off into the trailer you go!" With that, another slave driver took Lie Otta off the stage and the man apologized to the audience and continued with the next slave in line.
152111.title: Turn back and check it out!

choices: Leave. I have better things to do.
1521111.content:
Midna's curiosity won over and decided to follow the young woman. She flew over the stage and down to the trailer behind it where Lie Otta was being lead.
The Princess struggled against the grasp of the slave driver who in turn, tightened his grip on her arm which caused the girl to yelp in pain. He threw her into the big, empty, horse-pulled trailer and slammed the door shut and locked it. Lie Otta got up and walked over to a barred window and looked out. She sighed and stood by the window but looked away. "How embarrassing..." she whispered to herself, oblivious to the fact that Midna was just outside the window listening. "Oh Cassiel, where are you?" Princess Lie Otta stared out the window once more, but with a more saddened gaze.
Midna lost a bit of interest in the young Princess. She obviously wasn't about to start telling her story to mid-air.
1521111.title: Fallow the Princess...

choices: steal it and have link wear it
152112.content: Midna was floating around knowing no one could see her and wanders off into the back alley ways and see's a sign with the outline of a naked woman. "This looks interesting" And everywhere there was strange items dildos, butt plugs, wooden hand cuffs, whips, ect, but what really caught her eye was a necklace with a tag on it that said to put it on whom ever you want to be your slave. She sat there thinking ,blushing, getting wet. What does she do
152112.title: A hyrulian adult store?

choices: She continues to jerk him off.
1521121.content:
Midna smirks and takes it while no one was looking and teleports back to link. She found him asleep and decided to have some "fun" with him. She grabbed his manhood and started to jerk him off. "After I give you this necklace it'll be like your sleeping all the time~"

What now?
1521121.title: steal it and have link wear it

1521122.content:
Midna looked around, and saw that nobody was there. She snapped her fingers, and she, and the store, disappeared.

Where does she reappear?
1521122.title: Taking the store

152112222.content: Okay, okay! What about, umm... Lake Hylia? Or maybe Kakariko Gorge?
152112222.title: No. Other!

info.brief_description: Even princesses need time off! Especially when they have an entire kingdom to themselves!
info.description:
In this story Midna and Link take some time off during their adventure to have their own kind of fun, whatever that may be! *wink wink*

Rules are as follows:
1) No killing characters (unless they're supposed to in game)
2) Make submissions longer than one sentence, PLEASE. At least one paragraph and be descriptive!
3) No scat, watersports or weight gain. (belly and breast expansion is okay)

Also, one more thing, in the Twilight, the spirits have a physical presence of their normal selves and can feel Link and Midna's influences, but are basically invisible and unable to see either of them

UPDATE: I've decided to allow vore in this, but under a few guidelines.
1) NO DETAILED SCAT. I just find it really gross that's all. You can say something like "She went to relieve herself of the remains of her meal" but don't describe process, please.
2) NO WEIGHT GAIN FROM DIGESTING PEOPLE. There's already an interactive for that.
3) A CHARACTER MUST REFORM AFTER DIGESTION. I don't really care how you do it, you could have rapid pregnancy and rebirth or just have them wake up next to the other (or if they're a spirit, they just respawn with no memory of being eaten)Unless they're just a random mook from the game.
4) ONLY MIDNA AND WOLF LINK (if you choose) CAN VORE. So as you'd assume, Midna can also only be prey to Link. And spirits CAN be eaten by the way.
5) ALL TYPES OF VORE ARE ALLOWED. Yes, even Hard Vore. But try to keep it from being bloody, after all, it IS vore from magic.

All right! 46 chapters, Thanks to all who contributed, let's try to get even more!
